name: Via Ferrata Rio Claro
description:
Introduction

This via ferrata shows up in several promotional ads for the area. It is by far the worst via ferrata I've ever done. It took 10 min to climb to the top, and 5 min to walk down. Furthermore, they won't let you do it without a guide (lol!). Even though I had all my personal climbing gear along with me. I poached it when no-one was looking.

The park does exist up a very pretty river valley however, and has one potential interesting attraction -- a cave through trip. There is lodging here and it would be a nice place to stay, just not to go to for the via ferrata.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites
